turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a Starbucks for pickup at my local Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a venti cherry mocha with nonfat milk and whipped cream, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti cherry mocha with nonfat milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: from which location are you picking it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The mall of Victor Valley in Victorville, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at the mall of victor valley.
